model.description: The alias of the model used to generate responses.

data.description: List of documents, where each document is a list of QA pairs.

items.description: A document containing multiple QA pairs.
A single QA pair with collected responses.

short_ground_truth.description: Concise ground-truth answer (first entry from `all_qa_pairs.json` for the section).

long_ground_truth.description: Long-form ground-truth answer (second entry if present, otherwise same as short_ground_truth).

short_response.description: The response generated with a short token limit.

long_response.description: The response generated with a long token limit.
